ComicInfo.Title: If Looks Could Kill, Part 5: Not That There's Anything Wrong With That
ComicInfo.Summary: One of them's frozen solid, the other is a pile of blue goo! They'll need each other to survive -- and it might involve exchanging bodily fluids! But even if they save each other, they still have to save the world from -- the LIGHTMASTER? No, we're not kidding...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:22:45. [CVDB105830]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Brooks, Patrick Zircher, Patrick Zircher, Rob Liefeld
ComicInfo.Inker: Crystal Reid, Mark Brooks, Patrick Zircher, Rob Liefeld, Rob Ross
ComicInfo.Editor: Andy Schmidt, Nicole Wiley Boose, Tom Brevoort
ComicInfo.Characters: Cable, Deadpool, Hammer, Irene Merryweather, Lightmaster
ComicInfo.Locations: Chicago, Daily Bugle Building, France, Germany, New York City, Singapore
